Docs.param: The IVsaError object representing the offending error.
Docs.summary: Notifies the host about how to respond to compiler errors encountered by the script engine.
Docs.returns: if the compiler is directed to continue reporting further errors to the IJSVsaSite object; if the compiler is directed to stop reporting further errors to the IVsaSite object.
